Hello,

I am new to heritrix and stuck with a problem.

I am running HEritr=
ix on the latest ubuntu distribution;

When I start a crawl, the job is imm=
ediately sent to the list of
completed jobs without being initialized. I fe=
t the error message:

Unable to setup crawl modules Exception: java.lang.Nu=
llPointerException

and
Level: WARNING Message: no root element: U+ffffffff=
 in
'file:../order.xml', line: 1, column: 1

I have set the HTTP header's u=
ser-agent and from attributes to valid
values, so I think it is a different=
 prolem.

It would be great if someone can help.
Thanks in advance.

Sonja =
Schaule
